SummaryEnglish: In a world of idle gods, humans are forced into brain challenges with them. With three defeats, gods lose their right to challenge, while 10 victories spell human triumph. Fay, determined to achieve the impossible, enters the ultimate test of wits against the gods. Will he defy divinity, or is he just another loss in the making?
Aliases: 神は遊戯〈ゲーム〉に飢えている。
Kami wa Yūgi ni Uete Iru.
Kamigami ni Idomu Shounen no Kyuukyoku Zunousen
The Ultimate Game-Battles of a Boy and the Gods

1.TitleEnglish: A special number just before the broadcast! TV anime "God is hungry for play" complete strategy guide!
1.SummaryEnglish: A special program in which the four main cast members of the TV anime "God is hungry for play," which began airing in April, convey the appeal of the work just before the broadcast. More information < program content> The ultimate brain game showdown between the cast members has begun! We invite you to the world of "God Hunger" as soon as possible. If you watch this, you will definitely be able to completely capture how to enjoy the work! < appearance> Nobunaga Shimazaki (as Fei), Akari Kito (as Leoleche), Hina Tachibana (as Pearl), Kanna Nakamura (as Nell)

In an ice wall that was created during the last ice age, a group discovers a thinly clad girl. To her surprise, she calls herself a former goddess and immediately demands the best gamer in the world...

2.SummaryEnglish: Fay and Leshea are thrown into their first gods' game together against Titan. The game they play is Hide-and-God-Seek. Fay and Leshea try to outsmart Titan as their teammates get incapacitated one after another.

3.SummaryEnglish: Fay and Leshea are told that they need to find some other team members to participate in the gods' games with them. They happen to meet another Apostle named Pearl Diamond, but she seems to have an interesting past with a different team...

4.SummaryEnglish: Fay, Leshea, and Pearl join up with Pearl's former team to try to take down the god Uroboros in the gods' games.

5.SummaryEnglish: Fay, Leshea, and Pearl are invited to the city of Mal-ra to participate in something called the World Games Tour.

6.SummaryEnglish: Fay and Pearl team up to fight against Dax and Kelritch. The game: Card Battle Sugoroku: Mind Arena. Will Pearl be able to prove herself to her friends?

7.SummaryEnglish: Fay, Leshea, and Pearl team up with Dax and Kelritch to go up against the god Mahtma II in their next gods' game that takes place in the desert.

8.SummaryEnglish: Fay's team begins their game against the Mahtma II and his army. Fay's team is completely outnumbered and Dax makes a surprising move. Will they be able to get the sun flower to the top of the pyramid?

9.SummaryEnglish: Nel must face the Bookmaster and bet Fay's wins in a game in order to try to make a comeback so she can join Fay's team.

10.TitleEnglish: The Three Cheats the God Brings Forth
10.SummaryEnglish: After Nel failed against the Bookmaster, Fay must try to win against the Bookmaster and Three Cheats.

11.TitleEnglish: The Labyrinth of No Return: Luceimia
11.SummaryEnglish: Apostles from around the world are being forced to play a game in the Luceimia Labyrinth. Unlike most games where once the player loses, they are sent back to the real world, anytime someone loses in this game, they are forced to respawn.

12.TitleEnglish: The "Labyrinth" of Death and Rebirth: Luceimia
12.SummaryEnglish: Fay and the other Apostles manage to find the save item which allows some of them to escape the labyrinth. Uroboros joins Fay and his party as they continue through the labyrinth.

13.SummaryEnglish: Will Fay and his friends face the final boss of Luceimia. Will they be able to make it out of the labyrinth alive?
